mapper.insert: insert into chat (content, read_chk, send_nick, recv_nick, room) values (#{content}, #{readChk}, #{sendNick}, #{recvNick}, #{room})
mapper.select: select * from chat where room = #{room} order by cno

select cno, content, read_chk, send_nick, recv_nick, room, send_at, m.nick_name as send_nick_name, m2.nick_name as recv_nick_name from chat c inner join `member` m on c.send_nick = m.mno inner join `member` m2 on c.recv_nick = m2.mno where cno in (select max(cno) from chat group by room) order by cno desc

select cno, content, read_chk, send_nick, recv_nick, room, send_at, m.nick_name as send_nick_name, m2.nick_name as recv_nick_name from chat c inner join `member` m on c.send_nick = m.mno inner join `member` m2 on c.recv_nick = m2.mno where cno = #{cno}
select max(room) as maxroom from chat
